title: Love in Hollywood
description: LoveOnly onceOr againI'm happy in my life the way I live or we lived until everything change. One girl makes me want again that I forget. My passion, my work or my love.One movieWe fell in love in wrong way. Every second we want each other but something tied us. My wife Or Our loveShe left me on the edge of wanting her. We promised each other for choosing what's important in our life. We promised for moving on.But in reality we move on or not.
author: Missi Angel
